suggestions.description: Focus on improving the operational efficiency of agents through advanced scoping techniques.
suggestions.best_practice: Conduct time-motion studies to identify bottlenecks.

suggestions.description: Develop systems that help agents make more informed and accurate decisions.
suggestions.best_practice: Integrate AI and data analytics tools for enhanced decision support.

suggestions.description: Create a more effective communication process for agents to connect with stakeholders.
suggestions.best_practice: Implement collaborative tools and define clear communication protocols.

suggestions.description: The project is aimed at internal staff to enhance their operational capabilities.
suggestions.best_practice: Involve team leaders in the scoping process to ensure alignment with staff needs.

suggestions.description: The focus is on providing tools and processes for clients to improve their agent-related tasks.
suggestions.best_practice: Conduct client interviews to gain insights into their specific needs and preferences.

suggestions.description: The project benefits both internal staff and clients, improving operations across the board.
suggestions.best_practice: Balance the needs of both groups by setting distinct, yet complementary objectives.

interactions.custom_input: 2, but for clients not their agents

suggestions.description: Develop personalized software solutions tailored to each client's specific needs.
suggestions.best_practice: Conduct thorough needs assessments with clients before development.

suggestions.description: Create a training program that equips clients with the skills to effectively use the new tools.
suggestions.best_practice: Ensure the training is practical and relates directly to client workflows.

suggestions.description: Provide continuous support and regular updates to ensure client success.
suggestions.best_practice: Establish a dedicated support team to address client queries and issues.
